mdRecord.dcterms:title: John Webster in the Lower Garden
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Providence Journal Company
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photographic print of head gardener John Webster standing next to the well in the lower garden. Webster holds an antique copper watering can; an identical contemporary of two original watering cans owned by George Washington and found in the Mount Vernon collection. Photograph taken for an 1956 article in the Providence Sunday Journal.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon Ladies' Association of the Union--Employees
Lower Garden
